description: The Universal Protocol Platform is a transformational development for the entire blockchain industry, allowing new types of digital assets to be created and all cryptocurrencies to be convertible on a single network. The issuer of Universal Protocol Token (UPT) and Universal Proxy Tokens, Universal Protocol Pte. Ltd., a Singapore company, and the Trust are run on a not-for-profit basis and any profits from the Universal Protocol Platform will be used to reimburse UP Alliance members, to buy back UPT, or given to environmental charities, in mitigation of blockchain’s energy intensity, and charities supporting economic inclusion.
name: Universal Protocol Token
